Source.Name: dmd
Source.Summary: Compiler and standard library for the D programming language
Source.Description: D is a systems programming language with C-like syntax and static typing. It combines efficiency, control and modeling power with safety and programmer productivity.

Package.Name: dmd
Package.Summary: Compiler and standard library for the D programming language
Package.Description: D is a systems programming language with C-like syntax and static typing. It combines efficiency, control and modeling power with safety and programmer productivity.
